sentences.en: A compliance coefficient is a particular kind of flexibility - influence coefficient.
sentences.cn: 柔度系数是挠曲影响系数的一种特殊类型.

sentences.en: He has reasoned me into compliance.
sentences.cn: 他向我说出种种道理,使我非答应不可.
她泰然处之地替我安排.

sentences.en: I thought I prevented another explosion by my compliance.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我依从了,可以免去另一场乱子.

sentences.en: I was surprised by his compliance with these terms.
sentences.cn: 我对他竟然依从了这些条件而感到吃惊.

sentences.en: In most computerized systems, there are only two states: nonexistence or full - compliance.
sentences.cn: 多数计算机系统只有两种状态,即不存在或者全部一致.

sentences.en: Inspectors were sent to visit nuclear sites and verify compliance with the treaty.
sentences.cn: 监察员被派去参观核址并核实条约的遵守情况。

sentences.en: procedures that must be followed to ensure full compliance with the law
sentences.cn: 为确保严格遵守法律所必须遵行的程序

sentences.en: She gave up the idea in compliance with his desire.
sentences.cn: 她顺从他的愿望而放弃自己的主意.

sentences.en: The fourth - rank tensors contain the compliance and stiffness constants.
sentences.cn: 四秩张量包含柔量常数和刚度常数.

sentences.en: The Security Council aim to ensure compliance by all sides, once an agreement is signed.
sentences.cn: 一旦签署协议，安理会的目标就是保证各方都要遵守。

sentences.en: There are penalties for non-compliance with the fire regulations.
sentences.cn: 不遵守消防规章的行为要受到处罚。

sentences.en: Torques resulting from this change are called compliance torques.
sentences.cn: 这种变化产生的力矩称为弹性变形力矩.

phrases.tran_cn: 符合证明；一致的证明；合约完成证明书
合规性审计；符合规章审计；法规符合审计
病人的依从性；病人的配合度

trans.tran_en: when someone obeys a rule, agreement, or demand
